tool.name: CyVerse interaction via iRODS
tool.description: This Galaxy tool is used to upload files to G-OnRamp's Data Commons store on CyVerse

param.name: destpath
param.label: Subdirectory to install to - descriptive is good

param.name: timestamp
param.label: Place Timestamp in directory name for uniqueness? (ex: aName_20180604T212729)

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Usage:
* Select data to upload (a JBrowse hub or UCSC hub created with a Hub Archive Creator) * (optionally\ :sup:`1`\ ) choose a subdirectory name for the remote destination * choose whether or not to include a timestamp in the directory name * enter your CyVerse username and password
this will upload your hub to your CyVerse account, making it available to visualize
.. class:: warningmark
*1: while optional, a descriptive name is best, as the default will be 'myHub' with a timestamp.*
